snippet: The moment Novak Djokovic accepted that being part of the Roger Federer/Rafael Nadal era was a chance, not a curse, everything improved for him....
lead_paragraph: The moment Novak Djokovic accepted that being part of the Roger Federer/Rafael Nadal era was a chance, not a curse, everything improved for him.

headline.print_headline: Being Part of the Federer/Nadal Era a Career Booster, Says Djokovic
headline.main: Being Part of the Federer/Nadal Era a Career Booster, Says Djokovic
